org.mindroid.api

Class StatemachineAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mindroid.api.BasicAPI
      • org.mindroid.api.StatemachineAPI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMindroidMain

    public class StatemachineAPI
extends BasicAPI
implements IMindroidMain
    Created by Torben on 03.05.2017. Can contain multiple Parallel or single running Statemachines in its StatemachineCollection. Parallel groups or single Statemachines can be identified using their GroupID.
